@antonio_ortiz @devchattv @cmaxw Thanks Antonio! This is the model that @Netlify supports. With sites being deployed directly to a CDN and things like cache management all looked after for you. Then, this UI can be augmented if you need with APIs hosted as serverless functions. https://t.co/UW1N4ombFx
